title: Zesty lemon tart
ingredients: ['For the shortbread base', '65g butter', '45g caster sugar', '78g plain flour', 'For the topping', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '125g caster sugar', '50ml fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '25g plain flour, sifted', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', 'icing sugar to dust']
